text: Uye nekuda kwetsitsi dzaAllah, wakashanda navo mune zvakanaka. Uye dai (Muhammad (SAW)) wakakasharara nekuoma moyo, vangadai vakasiyana newe; saka varegerere, uye vakumbirire ruregerero (kuna Allah); uye pangana navo pamhaka dzese. Uye kana uchinge watora mhereredzo, isa ruvimbo rwako muna Allah, zvirokwazvo, Allah vanoda avo vanoisa ruvimbo rwavo (mavari)
